item.description:
Hi Westport Boston Terrier Meetup Members
We enjoyed the Westport Town Beach so much that I decided to do it again this month! We can meet at my house in Westport or if you know the way we could meet you at the beach! I'll try not to have such a lead foot this time!!!
Bad or rainy weather will cancel this event!
Hope to see you all on December 6th!!
Linda and Bob Bramwell-508673517
20 Truman St Westport,Ma
Ps: If you decide to meet us on the beach we will be there around 10:15!!!!! Also, I am looking for suggestions on where to meetup for the winter!!!

group.name: The Westport Boston Terrier Meetup Group

item.name: The Westport Boston Terrier December Meetup
